sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: You're watching Euronews now. I'm Tecumbo Sulako with your top stories.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: The German Chancellor Olaf Scholz is the latest Western leader to visit Kiev in a bid to de-escalate tensions over Russia's military build-up on Ukraine's border.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: First France, now Belgium. The self-proclaimed Freedom Convoy heads to Brussels with plans to block the city over COVID protections.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Proclaimed Freedom convoy heads to Brussels with plans to block the city over Covid protections. And cleared to compete, sports court of arbitration allows the Russian figure skater Kamila Valieva to contest for another gold despite that failed drugs test.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Diplomatic efforts to try to find a solution to the Russian-Ukrainian crisis continue.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: A week after French President Emmanuel Macron's visit to Kiev and Moscow, German Chancellor Olaf Scholz takes his turn.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Our reporter in Kiev, Sasha Vakulina, tells us more.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: German Chancellor Olaf Scholz is in Kiev on Monday to meet with Ukraine's President Volodymyr Zelenskyy in a bid to show solidarity.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: In recent weeks, Olaf Scholz toughened his rhetoric after critics accused him of a lack of leadership in one of Europe's worst security crises in decades.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The US, UK and Germany are among several countries who urged their nationals to get out of Ukraine immediately. Dutch airline KLM has already cancelled all flights to Ukraine over the weekend and other carriers are reviewing their plans amid insurance issues. in response to that Ukraine's government allocated 520 million euros to guarantee the continuation of flights through Ukrainian airspace Sasha bakulina Euronews from Moscow accuses Washington of a large-scale disinformation campaign around Ukraine.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: That's what Russia's presidential aide Yuri Ushakov told journalists after President Vladimir Putin and Joe Biden's phone conversation on Saturday.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Mr. Ushakov said that the discussion was businesslike, that the discussion was businesslike but he stressed that the u.s inflated his theory and had provided false information to the media he added that it had artificially escalated tensions about russian troops which were based on their own territory which which Mr. Ushakov described as absurd.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: So far, all the diplomatic efforts have failed to bring about any breakthrough.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Tomorrow German Chancellor Olaf Scholz is expected in Moscow to continue the dialogue.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Ahead of the visit, he urged Russia to de-escalate and said he was ready for serious talks on European security.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: And on Sunday, the u.s national security advisor jake salomon said that russia could invade ukraine any day now and the russian foreign ministry spokeswoman maria zaharova accused the u.s of making a propaganda of war. Galina Polonskaya from Moscow for Euronews. Coming from all over France, around 300 cars, trucks and camper vans took part in a Canadian-style protest convoy against the Covid regulations.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: They congregated in a supermarket car park near Lille on Sunday.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Brussels is bracing itself as the protesters intend to travel to the Belgian capital on Monday to protest in front of European Union institutions.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Officials have already banned any attempt to demonstrate there.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: The plan is to go to all the European institutions little by little because it also happens at the European level.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: We see that it is more or less the same thing in all the countries. So there is this will to go forward.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: We don't know how far we will go, but we will go forward and we will make our voices heard because we can't do it otherwise.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The flag-bearing trek north comes after 97 people were arrested in Paris on Saturday.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Tear gas was fired in the city as thousands of demonstrators defied an order banning the convoy.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The groups have been inspired by the self-starred Canadian Freedom Convoy, which has disrupted trade on the US border in occupied streets in Ottawa.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Similar demonstrations have started to spread around the world.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: A man's been shot dead after threatening police officers with a knife at a French train station.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: The incident happened at Paris' Gare de Nours this morning at around 7am.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: The interior minister says the man died on the spot and the officers received minor injuries and it caused major traffic disruptions.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: No one else was hurt.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: An anti-police slogan was found on the weapon held by the perpetrator.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Authorities added it was not thought to be terrorist-related and the man had been known to the police for hanging around the station around 80 migrants are the latest have been picked up at sea from small fishing vessels by the Italian Coast Guard and taken to the island of Lampedusa those rescued are said to have been traveling from countries such as the Ivory Coast and Somalia. According to the UN Refugee Agency, over 122,000 migrants arrived in Europe last year by crossing the Mediterranean.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Greek farmers used their tractors to block a main highway outside the city of Larissa on Sunday in protest at rising energy costs. At one point, they poured cans of milk on the ground to disrupt traffic. The farmers are demanding the abolition of the electricity price adjustment clause, which the government says reflects changes in the price of oil and natural gas imports.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Ivan Reitman, the man behind some of the most popular comedies of the late 20th century, including National Lampoon's Animal House to Ghostbusters, has died aged 75. According to his family, he passed away peacefully in his sleep on Saturday night at his home in California.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Among the other notable films he directed are Twins, Kindergarten Cop, Dave Jr. and he also produced Beethoven, among many others. Russian figure skater Kamila Valieva is allowed to continue the Winter Olympics.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: The Court of Abritation for Sport ruled the 15-year-old star should no longer be suspended despite her positive test for a banned substance in December.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: The court however stated a full investigation would be carried out.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: The CAS ad hoc division was requested to determine the narrow issue as to whether a provisional suspension should be imposed on the athlete but it was neither requested to rule on the merits of this case nor to examine the legal consequences related to the results of the team event in the figure skating, as such issues will be examined in other proceedings and not necessarily at CAS.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: The three judges said preventing the minor athlete from competing in the Olympics would cause her irreparable harm. From this Tuesday, the young prodigy can therefore aim for the individual Olympic gold in her first season as a senior.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: It was billed as a David and Goliath bout, but in the end, the star-studded lineup of the Los Angeles Rams only just won out, beating underdog Cincinnati Bengals.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: But it was a close 23-20, the final score in the Super Bowl 56 in California.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The halftime entertainment was rap and hip-hop royalty with Kendrick Lamar, Eminem, Dr. Dre, Snoop Dogg and Mary J. Blythe all headlining.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Rams legend Cooper Cupp scored two touchdowns, including the winning score, and was named Super Bowl's Most Valuable Player.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The Los Angeles Rams has become the second straight team to win the Super Bowl in their home stadium, but it was certainly a tough old battle with the Cincinnati Bengals.
